S.FORM: Cai in un kapitanʉ koka mualiuhlʉ siihuna malitʉnʉlʉ cucuvuvulunga
Cai in on kapitanʉ koka moaliohlʉ siihona malitʉnʉlʉ cocovovolonga
S.TRANSL: 蔡英文總統代表政府 向原住民族道歉文。
President Tsai Ing-wen's Apology to the Indigenous Peoples on Behalf of the Government.

S.FORM: maapuahlʉusuacaihlimualualu miunguarinaani, mahlipapuhla, matingahla ngahla sitakuamiangahlana, maruauvuvulunga paramacuacungahla cucuvu vulunga, ku ucaanimatavilaucu raahlua sipiakasʉkasʉangahlanana, mataingalicu puamahlʉngʉ cucuvuvulunga taivangʉ, usuanganaiau mairahlucu cupisasaruana. musiri kani' mikasʉkasʉ angahlahlana, arinani tumuaitama taingalʉ kirakakuaukakakuata. tumuakumualiuhlu siihu umahlikua cucuvuvuvulunga, umarulangica tʉkʉmalitʉnʉ, marun hlicaliva upatʉ hlimiungu caihlina,hlipasalangʉlangʉa hla kuparaiiaiahlʉahlipumiana, mualiuhluaku siihu umahlikua acancancihli malitʉnʉlʉ.

maapoahlʉosoacaihlimoaloalo miongoarinaani, mahlipapohla, matingahla ngahla sitakoamiangahlana, maroaovovolonga paramacoacongahla cocovo volonga, ko ocaanimatavilaoco raahloa sipiakasʉkasʉangahlanana, mataingalico poamahlʉngʉ cocovovolonga taivangʉ, osoanganaiao mairahloco copisasaroana. mosiri kani' mikasʉkasʉ angahlahlana, arinani tomoaitama taingalʉ kirakakoaokakakoata. tomoakomoaliohlo siiho omahlikoa cocovovovolonga, omarolangica tʉkʉmalitʉnʉ, maron hlicaliva opatʉ hlimiongo caihlina,hlipasalangʉlangʉa hla koparaiiaiahlʉahlipomiana, moaliohloako siiho omahlikoa acancancihli malitʉnʉlʉ.
S.TRANSL: 二十二年前的今天，我們憲法 增修條文裡的「山胞」正式正 名為「原住民」。這個正名， 不僅去除了長期以來帶有歧視 的稱呼，更突顯了原住民族是 台灣「原來的主人」的地位。 站在這個基礎上，今天，我們 要更往前踏出一步。我要代表 政府，向全體原住民族，致上 我們最深的歉意。對於過去 四百年來，各位承受的苦痛和 不公平待遇，我代表政府，向 各位道歉。

On this day 22 years ago, the term "shanbao" (mountain people) in the Additional Articles of our Constitution was replaced with the proper name: "indigenous people". This correction not only did away with a discriminatory term, but also highlighted the status of indigenous peoples as Taiwan's "original owners". From this basis, today, we are taking another step forward. To all indigenous peoples of Taiwan: On behalf of the government, I express to you our deepest apology. For the four centuries of pain and mistreatment you have endured, I apologize to you on behalf of the government.

S.FORM: pautuamacuaku miunguarinani marusiangusipita liliungana, maruacucu'u usumanu sianatamika maliatʉnʉlʉ. kani'iia mairahlu hliparapihlaku arinani muliuhlu siihuna malitʉnʉlʉ. mahlicaliva kuparaiaiahlana siakitana, mahlicaliva hlipasalangʉlangʉa tahlana usumanʉna, mairahlusipuamia hlimaracucumangusipi angahlahlana arataisa, kani'i ia hliparapihlaku arinani musirinanina, sumalitʉtʉkʉhlʉ maivalʉ hla patakʉsʉlʉsipamia pacʉpʉcʉpʉngʉ.

paotoamacoako miongoarinani marosiangosipita liliongana, maroacoco'o osomano sianatamika maliatʉnʉlʉ. kani'iia mairahlo hliparapihlako arinani moliohlo siihona malitʉnʉlʉ. mahlicaliva koparaiaiahlana siakitana, mahlicaliva hlipasalangʉlangʉa tahlana osomanʉna, mairahlosipoamia hlimaracocomangosipi angahlahlana arataisa, kani'i ia hliparapihlako arinani mosirinanina, somalitʉtʉkʉhlʉ maivalʉ hla patakʉsʉlʉsipamia pacʉpʉcʉpʉngʉ.
S.TRANSL: 我相信，一直到今天，在我們 生活周遭裡，還是有一些人認 為不需要道歉。而這個，就是 今天我需要代表政府道歉的最 重要原因。把過去的種種不公 平視為理所當然，或者，把過 去其他族群的苦痛，視為人類 發展的必然結果，這是我今天 站在這裡，企圖要改變和扭轉 的第一個觀念。

I know that even now, there are some around us who see no need to apologize. But that is the most important reason why I am representing the government to issue this apology today. To see what was unfair in the past as a matter of course, or to treat the pain of other ethnic peoples as an unavoidable part of human development, this is the first mindset that we, standing here today, resolve to change and overturn.

S.FORM: umaru matalakiahlʉ kari mairahluna, umarutʉkʉkihlamuhlamu pahlu miamia, tiaraisaumahliakua cucuvuvulungamalitʉnʉlʉ. kani'i sasaruana taivangʉna, upatʉ hlimiungu caihli mualualu ia mairahlucu picucu'u maruaruisana, kani'i cucumaruaruisanana hlamairahlu mavacangʉka , siangusipisa takacicihli, pikari takacicihli vunguka

omaro matalakiahlʉ kari mairahlona, omarotʉkʉkihlamohlamo pahlo miamia, tiaraisaomahliakoa cocovovolongamalitʉnʉlʉ. kani'i sasaroana taivangʉna, opatʉ hlimiongo caihli moaloalo ia mairahloco picoco'o maroaroisana, kani'i cocomaroaroisanana hlamairahlo mavacangʉka , siangosipisa takacicihli, pikari takacicihli vongoka
S.TRANSL: 讓我用很簡單的語言，來表達 為什麼要向原住民族道歉的原 因。台灣這塊土地，四百年前 早有人居住。這些人原本過著 自己的生活，有著自己的語言、 文化、習俗、生活領域。接著， 在未經他們同意之下，這塊土 地上來了另外一群人。

Let me put in simple terms why we are apologizing to the indigenous peoples. Four hundred years ago, there were already people living in Taiwan. These first inhabitants lived their lives and had their own languages, cultures, customs, and domains. But then, without their consent, another group of people arrived on these shores, and in the course of history, took everything from the first inhabitants who, on the land they have known most intimately, became displaced, foreign, non-mainstream, and marginalized.

S.FORM: palisia pararana mangusipi, kicunguhlu makuhlipaimacuisa hlakana'ana, kani'i sasaruanana mʉcʉkʉhlʉa ucani tarʉana tahlana usumanʉ. hlicaliva hliarataisanana cucuhlimulivahlʉna hlicumalihlimalusangalʉ cucumairahlu maruaruisana. marumataingalʉa hlahlamanisa sasaruanana tarapasʉngʉ, maracucuhliarahlusuhlusu marakupipalungu marapatʉpatʉkʉa cucu'u. siparamacumacua ucani tahlana, kumatumuhlu'aika hliarilangʉlangʉa maricʉka ma tahlana usumanʉhla, ucaniimacii kutakacicihli maluliri ihlata ia ucani pihliparaiaiahlʉa koka, kuaunana ia kani'i hlicalivalikisina tumua puatʉtʉrʉpumahlʉmahlʉngʉ, tumua hlikitana pakiapuhlu kihlahlamu. hla macua macuuisa ia, tumua siihuna marapihli kani'i hlicalivana musaumarutʉkʉ pahluaiaili, ihlaisa hliparapihlaku arinani musiri nani arinani.

palisia pararana mangosipi, kicongohlo makohlipaimacoisa hlakana'ana, kani'i sasaroanana mʉcʉkʉhlʉa ocani tarʉana tahlana osomanʉ. hlicaliva hliarataisanana cocohlimolivahlʉna hlicomalihlimalosangalʉ cocomairahlo maroaroisana. maromataingalʉa hlahlamanisa sasaroanana tarapasʉngʉ, maracocohliarahlosohloso marakopipalongo marapatʉpatʉkʉa coco'o. siparamacomacoa ocani tahlana, komatomohlo'aika hliarilangʉlangʉa maricʉka ma tahlana osomanʉhla, ocaniimacii kotakacicihli maloliri ihlata ia ocani pihliparaiaiahlʉa koka, koaonana ia kani'i hlicalivalikisina tomoa poatʉtʉrʉpomahlʉmahlʉngʉ, tomoa hlikitana pakiapohlo kihlahlamo. hla macoa macooisa ia, tomoa siihona marapihli kani'i hlicalivana mosaomarotʉkʉ pahloaiaili, ihlaisa hliparapihlako arinani mosiri nani arinani.
S.TRANSL: 歷史的發展是，後來的這一 群人，剝奪了原先這一群人 的一切。讓他們在最熟悉的 土地上流離失所，成為異鄉 人，成為非主流，成為邊緣。一個族群的成功，很有可能 是建立在其他族群的苦難之 上。除非我們不宣稱自己是 一個公義的國家，否則這一 段歷史必須正視，真相必須 說出來。然後，最重要的， 政府必須為這段過去真誠反 省，這就是我今天站在這裡 的原因。

The success of one ethnic people can be built on the suffering of another. Unless we deny that we are a country of justice, we must face up to this history. We must tell the truth. And then, most importantly, the government must genuinely reflect on this past. This is why I stand here today.

S.FORM: marua ucani tʉpʉhlana suhlatʉ, piahlisuhlata hlicaliva taivangʉ,. hlipatacu ngucunguhlua kari siaucani ngʉtʉhlana hlipakipuhlua amihla uka'a suhlata taivangʉ. hlirumia'amusikunga taku'iiarʉa hlakʉsaiana ia saarumia cingtai taku'i'iarʉ. kani'iiasapihlicaliva hlitamahlʉnga pakisia'a. cucuvuvulunga maupiaini hlimiailicaihlimualualu mairahlucumaruaru kani'isasaruanana pisipacʉcʉpʉngʉ miahlivihlivimavacangʉkavung ukaisa, tumahlusuhlusu muvavilihlisa. kuhlaisahla ucaniisipuamiahlamu sʉngʉpʉrʉmiamʉtʉmʉtʉa hlisuhlatahlicaliva, marapihlikani'i muliuhluaku siihu umahlikua cucuvuvulunga malitʉnʉlʉ.

maroa ocani tʉpʉhlana sohlatʉ, piahlisohlata hlicaliva taivangʉ,. hlipataco ngocongohloa kari siaocani ngʉtʉhlana hlipakipohloa amihla oka'a sohlata taivangʉ. hliromia'amosikonga tako'iiarʉa hlakʉsaiana ia saaromia cingtai tako'i'iarʉ. kani'iiasapihlicaliva hlitamahlʉnga pakisia'a. cocovovolonga maopiaini hlimiailicaihlimoaloalo mairahlocomaroaro kani'isasaroanana pisipacʉcʉpʉngʉ miahlivihlivimavacangʉkavong okaisa, tomahlosohloso movavilihlisa. kohlaisahla ocaniisipoamiahlamo sʉngʉpʉrʉmiamʉtʉmʉtʉa hlisohlatahlicaliva, marapihlikani'i moliohloako siiho omahlikoa cocovovolonga malitʉnʉlʉ.
S.TRANSL: 有一本書叫做「台灣通史」。 它的序言的第一段提到:「台 灣固無史也。荷人啟之，鄭 氏作之，清代營之。」。這 就是典型的漢人史觀。原住 民族，早在幾千年前，就在 這塊土地上，有豐富的文化 和智慧，代代相傳。不過， 我們只會用強勢族群的角度 來書寫歷史，為此，我代表 政府向原住民族道歉。

There is a book called "The General History of Taiwan" published in 1920. In its foreword are these words: "Taiwan had no history. The Dutch pioneered it, the Koxinga Kingdom built it, and the Qing Empire managed it." This is a typical Han view of history. The truth is that indigenous peoples have been here for thousands of years, with rich culture and wisdom that have been passed down through generations. But we only know to write history from the perspective of the dominant. For this, I apologize to the indigenous peoples on behalf of the government.

S.FORM: 'aumusikunga nua hlamhlammarʉ umarumanganʉ sitakuamia maruahlakʉvʉ tahlana'aulia apingʉtʉhlʉ angahlahlanaisa vahlituku, caihlihlakusaiana kiariari, hlimurutaisa murucara'ʉ nua arupapiamiamʉtʉmʉtʉcumalihli akuisa 'aumumana ia umarumiacʉpʉlʉ miapualʉ mativalʉtʉkʉisa, miungutarisilʉpʉngʉtarik icangihli umuhlicua siihu hlamhlammarʉna, taku'i'iarʉ sitakuamiaisa vuvulunga nua mapuhlarʉ. kani'I upatʉ hlimiungucaihlana, aucaucani hlimʉcʉkʉhlʉ mahlukua taivangʉna tʉkʉhlʉa hlitakumiaisa umarumiamʉtʉmʉtʉ tarikicangihli cumalihli malusangalʉ sasaruana, maiakakacu mairahlupi isikanacucuvuvulungana. marapihli kani'i muliuhluaku siihu umahlikua cucuvuvulunga malitʉnʉlʉ.

'aomosikonga noa hlamhlammarʉ omaromanganʉ sitakoamia maroahlakʉvʉ tahlana'aolia apingʉtʉhlʉ angahlahlanaisa vahlitoko, caihlihlakosaiana kiariari, hlimorotaisa morocara'ʉ noa aropapiamiamʉtʉmʉtʉcomalihli akoisa 'aomomana ia omaromiacʉpʉlʉ miapoalʉ mativalʉtʉkʉisa, miongotarisilʉpʉngʉtarik icangihli omohlicoa siiho hlamhlammarʉna, tako'i'iarʉ sitakoamiaisa vovolonga noa mapohlarʉ. kani'I opatʉ hlimiongocaihlana, aocaocani hlimʉcʉkʉhlʉ mahlokoa taivangʉna tʉkʉhlʉa hlitakomiaisa omaromiamʉtʉmʉtʉ tarikicangihli comalihli malosangalʉ sasaroana, maiakakaco mairahlopi isikanacocovovolongana. marapihli kani'i moliohloako siiho omahlikoa cocovovolonga malitʉnʉlʉ.
S.TRANSL: 荷蘭及鄭成功政權對平埔族群 的屠殺和經濟剝削，清朝時代 重大的流血衝突及鎮壓，日本 統治時期全面而深入的理番政 策，一直到戰後中華民國政府 施行的山地平地化政策。四百 年來，每一個曾經來到台灣的 政權，透過武力征伐、土地掠 奪，強烈侵害了原住民族既有 的權利。為此，我代表政府向 原住民族道歉。

The Dutch and the Koxinga Kingdom massacred and exploited the Pingpu ethnic group. The Qing Empire presided over bloody confrontations and suppression. Colonial Japan put in place comprehensive savage policies. And the post- war ROC government undertook assimilation policies. For 400 years, every regime that has come to Taiwan has brutally violated the rights of indigenous peoples through armed invasion and land seizure. For this, I apologize to the indigenous peoples on behalf of the government.

S.FORM: cucuvuvulunga umarumaiirahlu ahlahlamanisa maiatuhluhlu miararuma, apulavaʉ sitakuavʉhlʉvʉhlʉrʉna, hla umarumaiirahlu sipacʉcʉpʉngʉna siparaiiaiiahla. manikiia makani'i hliapusiria hlicaliva sitakuamia kokana, cucuvuvulunga umahlikua ta'iaraisa takacicihli, marahlupucua hlatatʉkʉaisa takacicihli, hlamanganʉisa maiatuhluhlu takacicihli aparahlupumairahlu tumahlaʉtarʉana, hlamanganʉhliapucua cucutahlana kumʉmʉa apautuamacu, marapihli kani'i muliuhluaku siihu umahlikuacucuvuvulunga malitʉnʉlʉ.

cocovovolonga omaromaiirahlo ahlahlamanisa maiatohlohlo miararoma, apolavaʉ sitakoavʉhlʉvʉhlʉrʉna, hla omaromaiirahlo sipacʉcʉpʉngʉna siparaiiaiiahla. manikiia makani'i hliaposiria hlicaliva sitakoamia kokana, cocovovolonga omahlikoa ta'iaraisa takacicihli, marahlopocoa hlatatʉkʉaisa takacicihli, hlamanganʉisa maiatohlohlo takacicihli aparahlopomairahlo tomahlaʉtarʉana, hlamanganʉhliapocoa cocotahlana komʉmʉa apaotoamaco, marapihli kani'i moliohloako siiho omahlikoacocovovolonga malitʉnʉlʉ.
S.TRANSL: 原住民族依傳統慣習維繫部落 的秩序，並以傳統智慧維繫生 態的平衡。但是，在現代國家 體制建立的過程中，原住民族 對自身事務失去自決、自治的 權利。傳統社會組織瓦解，民 族集體權利也不被承認。為 此，我代表政府向原住民族道 歉。

Indigenous peoples maintain tribal order according to traditional customs, and ecological balance according to traditional wisdom. But in the process of modern state-building, indigenous peoples lost the right to steer their own course and govern their own affairs. The fabric of traditional societies was torn apart, and the collective rights of peoples were not recognized. For this, I apologize to the indigenous peoples on behalf of the government.

S.FORM: cucuvuvulunga hlamairahlu maruakarisa takacicihli, hlicaliva akuisa'aumu mana apa'ʉcʉmʉ sitakuamia kapitanʉ'aumu, ma 1945caihli rumahlaʉ, siihu kana'a kuapaluliri kari takacicihli, marapihlicuka karicucuvuvulunga marahlupu, tamataingalʉa karitahla na'auliana marangangatʉmarahlupu, siihu kiariari umahlikua mairahlu vunguka cucuvuvulunga, kuiatʉhlʉnga hlipaimiaisa maiatuhluhluisana, marapihlikani'i muliuhluaku siihu umahlikua cucuvuvulunga malitʉnʉlʉ.

cocovovolonga hlamairahlo maroakarisa takacicihli, hlicaliva akoisa'aomo mana apa'ʉcʉmʉ sitakoamia kapitanʉ'aomo, ma 1945caihli romahlaʉ, siiho kana'a koapaloliri kari takacicihli, marapihlicoka karicocovovolonga marahlopo, tamataingalʉa karitahla na'aoliana marangangatʉmarahlopo, siiho kiariari omahlikoa mairahlo vongoka cocovovolonga, koiatʉhlʉnga hlipaimiaisa maiatohlohloisana, marapihlikani'i moliohloako siiho omahlikoa cocovovolonga malitʉnʉlʉ.
S.TRANSL: 原住民族本來有他們的母 語，歷經日本時代的同化 和皇民化政策，以及 1945 年之後，政府禁止說族語， 導致原住民族語言嚴重流 失。絕大多數的平埔族語 言已經消失。歷來的政府， 對原住民族傳統文化的維 護不夠積極，為此，我代 表政府向原住民族道歉。

Indigenous peoples had their own languages. However, with Japanese rule aiming to assimilate and turn all into imperial subjects, and with the ROC government banning tribal languages after 1945, indigenous peoples' languages suffered great losses. Most Pingpu languages have disappeared. Successive governments have been negligent in the protection of indigenous cultures. For this, I apologize to the indigenous peoples on behalf of the government.

S.FORM: caihlikana'a maruasiihuna kuacacahlia tahlana iamerukuna pahlumiamia saikua miararumaisaka talʉhlʉ'ʉa. cucutahlana sasaruana lanii pasakamu maritara'ʉ lʉhlʉ'ʉ maiakakana, marapihlikani'i muliuhluaku siihuna umahlikua cucuvuvulunga malitʉnʉlʉ.

caihlikana'a maroasiihona koacacahlia tahlana iamerokona pahlomiamia saikoa miararomaisaka talʉhlʉ'ʉa. cocotahlana sasaroana lanii pasakamo maritara'ʉ lʉhlʉ'ʉ maiakakana, marapihlikani'i moliohloako siihona omahlikoa cocovovolonga malitʉnʉlʉ.
S.TRANSL: 當年，政府在雅美族人 不知情的情況下，將核 廢料存置在蘭嶼。蘭嶼 的族人承受核廢料的傷 害。為此，我要代表政 府向雅美族人道歉。

Without the knowledge of the Yami tribe, the government stored nuclear waste on Orchid Island. Tribe members on the island had to suffer the negative consequences. For this, I apologize to the Yami people on behalf of the government.

S.FORM: angahlicunana puaruaruma miungu kani'i, maruaru ulalikasana mapuhlarutahlana 'aulia mʉlʉmʉlʉmʉpakipuhlu ia, angahli hlimaiatuhluhluna aparakuka ngahlacucutahlana'aulia, marapihli kani'i muliuhluaku mʉmʉa siihuna umahlikua cucutahlana'aulia malitʉnʉlʉ.

angahliconana poaroaroma miongo kani'i, maroaro olalikasana mapohlarotahlana 'aolia mʉlʉmʉlʉmʉpakipohlo ia, angahli hlimaiatohlohlona aparakoka ngahlacocotahlana'aolia, marapihli kani'i moliohloako mʉmʉa siihona omahlikoa cocotahlana'aolia malitʉnʉlʉ.
S.TRANSL: 自外來者進入台灣以 來，居住在西部平原的 平埔族群首當其衝。歷 來統治者消除平埔族群 個人及民族身分，為此， 我代表政府，向平埔族 群道歉。

Ever since outsiders began arriving in Taiwan, the Pingpu ethnic group on the western plains have born the brunt of the impact. One ruling power after another eroded the individual and collective identities of the Pingpu ethnic group. For this, I apologize to the Pingpu ethnic group on behalf of the government.

S.FORM: takʉsʉlʉa sitakuamia rumahlaʉ hliumalivalʉa kokana hlipakinia cucuvuvulunga takuamia ta'iara, hlitumamahlʉngʉa kokana ucani sipiatʉtʉrʉa, hlitumamahlʉngʉ mʉmʉa ucan isipasamanganʉ, arinani tampihlitakuhlusuhlusuaita, sipatʉahla parikiatungusana cucuvuvulunga ta'iara, hlamacua kani'i sipakatʉrana kupualisʉhlʉisana siihuna, kuakulaia hlitakumia takuiahlivihlivi kuiatʉhlʉnga mavacangʉisa, marapihli kani'i mualiuhluaku siihu umahlikua cucuvuvulunga malitʉnʉlʉ.

takʉsʉlʉa sitakoamia romahlaʉ hliomalivalʉa kokana hlipakinia cocovovolonga takoamia ta'iara, hlitomamahlʉngʉa kokana ocani sipiatʉtʉrʉa, hlitomamahlʉngʉ mʉmʉa ocan isipasamanganʉ, arinani tampihlitakohlosohlosoaita, sipatʉahla parikiatongosana cocovovolonga ta'iara, hlamacoa kani'i sipakatʉrana kopoalisʉhlʉisana siihona, koakolaia hlitakomia takoiahlivihlivi koiatʉhlʉnga mavacangʉisa, marapihli kani'i moaliohloako siiho omahlikoa cocovovolonga malitʉnʉlʉ.
S.TRANSL: 民主轉型後，國家曾經回應原住民 族運動的訴求。政府做過一些承諾、 也做過一些努力。我們有相當進步 的「原住民族基本法」，不過，這 部法律，並沒有獲得政府機關的普 遍重視。我們做得不夠快、不夠全 面、不夠完善。為此，我要代表政 府，向原住民族道歉。

After the democratic transition, the country began to respond to the appeals of indigenous movements. The government made certain promises and efforts. Today, we have an Indigenous Peoples Basic Law that is quite advanced. However, government agencies have not given sufficient weight to this law. Our actions have not been fast enough, comprehensive enough or sound enough. For this, I apologize to the indigenous peoples on behalf of the government.

S.FORM: makuvaaua taivangʉna amihla, matumuhlu tarʉtatʉkʉhlʉ mavacangʉa vungukahlamu, hla miungu arinaani masiaravahlaʉvaʉ cucuvuvulunga, siatuturu angahlahlana mangusipina, sitakuamia kokana ma ahlahlapa siakitaasangalʉ, mairaahlumana hlimarinasʉku cucuvuvulungamacuna, macuahlikʉrʉmatʉkʉ cucuvuvulunga, ahlasipuakasʉkasʉna mairahlukuarakuka, kuatumuhlua hlatamahlʉngʉ siihu, apaitara'ʉhla cucuvuvulunga tahlana usumanʉ, kupihlicaliva matialulangʉlangʉi'arahlasana, marapihli kani'i mualiuhluaku siihu umahlikua cucuvuvulunga malitʉnʉlʉ.

makovaaoa taivangʉna amihla, matomohlo tarʉtatʉkʉhlʉ mavacangʉa vongokahlamo, hla miongo arinaani masiaravahlaʉvaʉ cocovovolonga, siatotoro angahlahlana mangosipina, sitakoamia kokana ma ahlahlapa siakitaasangalʉ, mairaahlomana hlimarinasʉko cocovovolongamacona, macoahlikʉrʉmatʉkʉ cocovovolonga, ahlasipoakasʉkasʉna mairahlokoarakoka, koatomohloa hlatamahlʉngʉ siiho, apaitara'ʉhla cocovovolonga tahlana osomanʉ, kopihlicaliva matialolangʉlangʉi'arahlasana, marapihli kani'i moaliohloako siiho omahlikoa cocovovolonga malitʉnʉlʉ.
S.TRANSL: 台灣號稱「多元文化」的社會。但 是，一直到今天，原住民族在健康、 教育、經濟生活、政治參與等許多 層面的指標，仍然跟非原住民存在 著落差。同時，對原住民族的刻板 印象、甚至是歧視，仍然沒有消失。 政府做得不夠多，讓原住民族承受 了一些其他族群沒有經歷過、感受 過的痛苦和挫折。為此，我要代表 政府，向原住民族道歉。

Taiwan is known as a culturally diverse society. But even today, indicators on health, education, economic livelihood, political participation and more still show gaps between indigenous and non- indigenous peoples. Meanwhile, stereotypes and even discrimination against indigenous peoples have not gone away. The government has not done enough, so indigenous peoples have suffered pain and frustration unknown to other ethnic peoples. For this, I apologize to the indigenous peoples on behalf of the government.

S.FORM: kuiatʉhlʉnga hlipasamanganʉhlamu, marapihlia muvavilihli kupakacani paukarahlata kuacahlia kuitʉhlʉnga hlipasamanʉhlamu, inicikia pasalangʉlangʉa cancancihli minisaʉ miungu arinani, macuisa akuainita'ai. hlialitʉnʉ likuarinanina maniki'airahluacu hlipasarʉkʉcʉ ia, manikiia siruamia kuakutumua ma upatʉ hlimiungu caihli hlipasalangʉlangʉa hliparakaka cucuvuvulungana, hlamarapihli kani'is uhlatʉ hlipingahla malitʉnʉlʉna, minisaʉ misau umaruamiakutʉkʉ upapalu, hlialitʉnʉlʉ arinanina kani'i ia ihlaisa ukakakua patasuuru cucukokana rumia arupakiahlahlamu.

koiatʉhlʉnga hlipasamanganʉhlamo, marapihlia movavilihli kopakacani paokarahlata koacahlia koitʉhlʉnga hlipasamanʉhlamo, inicikia pasalangʉlangʉa cancancihli minisaʉ miongo arinani, macoisa akoainita'ai. hlialitʉnʉ likoarinanina maniki'airahloaco hlipasarʉkʉcʉ ia, manikiia siroamia koakotomoa ma opatʉ hlimiongo caihli hlipasalangʉlangʉa hliparakaka cocovovolongana, hlamarapihli kani'is ohlatʉ hlipingahla malitʉnʉlʉna, minisaʉ misao omaroamiakotʉkʉ opapalo, hlialitʉnʉlʉ arinanina kani'i ia ihlaisa okakakoa patasooro cocokokana romia aropakiahlahlamo.
S.TRANSL: 我們不夠努力，而且世世代代， 都未能及早發現我們不夠努 力，才會讓各位身上的苦，一 直持續到今天。真的很抱歉。今天的道歉，雖然遲到了非 常久，卻是一個開始。我不 期望四百年來原住民族承受 的苦難傷害，會只因為一篇 文稿、一句道歉而弭平。但 是，我由衷地期待，今天的 道歉，是這個國家內部所有 人邁向和解的開始。

Our efforts have fallen short, and succeeding generations have been blind to this inadequacy. Because of this, your hardship has continued to this day. For this we are truly sorry. Today's apology is long overdue, but it is a beginning. I do not expect any one speech or phrase of apology to wipe away four centuries of pain and suffering by the indigenous peoples. But I do hope with all my heart that today's apology will set this country and all its people on the path towards reconciliation.

S.FORM: tuahlʉ parumia ihlaku ucani pacʉcʉpʉnga cucuvuvulungana, kisumahlʉngʉ hliaricucuvungu arinanina, matahlana kari hla'aluana sapimacu hla arupakiahlahlamu, macua usua sipiamiana ia ihlaisa kani'i, sapimacu hla arupa kiahlahlamua pahlumiamiaisa, hliapumia paumahlʉngʉhla macuisa inici tuahlʉmaramacu.

toahlʉ paromia ihlako ocani pacʉcʉpʉnga cocovovolongana, kisomahlʉngʉ hliaricocovongo arinanina, matahlana kari hla'aloana sapimaco hla aropakiahlahlamo, macoa osoa sipiamiana ia ihlaisa kani'i, sapimaco hla aropa kiahlahlamoa pahlomiamiaisa, hliapomia paomahlʉngʉhla macoisa inici toahlʉmaramaco.
S.TRANSL: 請容我用一個原住民族的智 慧，來說明今天的場合。在泰 雅族的語言裡，「真相」， 叫做 Balay。而「和解」叫做 Sbalay，也就是在 Balay 之前 加一個 S 的音。真相與和解， 其實是兩個相關的概念。換句 話說，真正的和解，只有透過 誠懇面對真相，才有可能達成。

Please allow me to shed light on this occasion with a piece of indigenous wisdom. In the Atayal language, truth is called "Balay", and reconciliation is called "Sbalay", so you simply add an "S" sound to "Balay". Truth and reconciliation are in fact two related concepts. In other words, only by facing the truth sincerely can reconciliation be attained.

S.FORM: ma vunguka cucuvuvulungana maci maruapuaka, cucumiararuma usumanʉna, maci pitʉkʉarupakiahlahlamu ia, maramasuahlituahlahlamana hlimaiakakana hla apaiakakana maripucu. patarucuvungu kupakacani arupakari akuainita'aimii, tumua acancancihli paumahlʉngʉ, kihlahlamu hlicalivaisamahlina, kani'i ia umaruamiacu sapimacuna minisaʉ hlicalivaisa miungupasalʉpʉngʉ, pasalʉpʉngʉ ia ariaʉlʉsʉcisa sasuana aparuua apimau canitahlakumapaci, apicalivia macuuisa hlicalivana. ihlaisacu arupakiahlahlamuna.

ma vongoka cocovovolongana maci maroapoaka, cocomiararoma osomanʉna, maci pitʉkʉaropakiahlahlamo ia, maramasoahlitoahlahlamana hlimaiakakana hla apaiakakana maripoco. patarocovongo kopakacani aropakari akoainita'aimii, tomoa acancancihli paomahlʉngʉ, kihlahlamo hlicalivaisamahlina, kani'i ia omaroamiaco sapimacona minisaʉ hlicalivaisa miongopasalʉpʉngʉ, pasalʉpʉngʉ ia ariaʉlʉsʉcisa sasoana aparooa apimao canitahlakomapaci, apicalivia macooisa hlicalivana. ihlaisaco aropakiahlahlamona.
S.TRANSL: 在原住民族的文化裡，當 有人得罪了部落裡的其 他人，有意想要和解的時 候，長老會把加害者和被 害者，都聚在一起。聚在 一起，不是直接道歉，而 是每個人都坦誠地，講出 自己的心路歷程。這個說 出真相的過程結束之後， 長老會要大家一起喝一 杯，讓過去的，真的過去。 這就是 Sbalay。

In indigenous cultures, when a tribe member has offended another and intends to reconcile, an elder brings together the offender and the offended – not to produce a direct apology, but to allow each side to frankly share their inner journeys. When this truth-telling concludes, the elder calls for everyone to drink together, so that what is past is truly past. This is "Sbalay".

S.FORM: uapapaluaku hlitarucucuvunga arinanina, ihlaisa kani'ii ucani siihu nua cucuvuvulunga maruaisana arupakiahlahlamu. maruamiaku hlicaliva hlipasasapuana, hlicaliva sapimacuna umaru patasuuru tuahlʉna, kuapatavavatʉ pakipuhlumaluliri, cucuvanana tukucu cucuvuvulunga pakiapuhlu mʉmʉa maluliri sipamiaisa. muruahlʉa kumarunaani patuhluhluna hla umarupaumahlʉngʉ, apulavaʉahlatuana hlipasasapua kiariari kucutuvarʉ 'ʉangahlangahla, kani'i kokana maru ucaniaari tuahlʉmacuuisa mukakakua arupakiahlahlamuna.

oapapaloako hlitarococovonga arinanina, ihlaisa kani'ii ocani siiho noa cocovovolonga maroaisana aropakiahlahlamo. maroamiako hlicaliva hlipasasapoana, hlicaliva sapimacona omaro patasooro toahlʉna, koapatavavatʉ pakipohlomaloliri, cocovanana tokoco cocovovolonga pakiapohlo mʉmʉa maloliri sipamiaisa. moroahlʉa komaronaani patohlohlona hla omaropaomahlʉngʉ, apolavaʉahlatoana hlipasasapoa kiariari kocotovarʉ 'ʉangahlangahla, kani'i kokana maro ocaniaari toahlʉmacooisa mokakakoa aropakiahlahlamona.
S.TRANSL: 我期待今天這個場合，就是 一個政府和原住民族之間的 Sbalay。我把過去的錯誤，過 去的真相，竭盡所能、毫無保 留地講出來。等一下，原住民 族的朋友，也會說出想法。我 不敢要求各位現在就原諒，但 是，我懇請大家保持希望，過 去的錯誤絕不會重複，這個國 家，有朝一日，可以真正走向 和解。

I hope today's occasion can be a "Sbalay" between the government and the indigenous peoples. I have spoken of past mistakes and truths the best I can, with nothing held back. In a moment, our indigenous friends will speak. I do not dare ask you to forgive, here and now. But I sincerely ask you to sustain the hope that past wrongs will not be repeated, and that one day, this country can see true reconciliation.

S.FORM: arinani ia hlamuna ruamia tuahlʉ'ania ahlʉahla arupakariana, kupacucu vuvulunga nua tahlana 'auliana ihlaisa ma siihuna. macahliaku umarua ngususangalʉiaku iatʉhlʉnga, marapihli cucuvuvulunga patasuuruhlitamahlʉnga mʉmʉana ia, ihlaisa kani'i kokana macuisa'aini tuahlʉa arupakiahlahlamuna maramacu ia kana'a kapalangʉlangʉa.

arinani ia hlamona roamia toahlʉ'ania ahlʉahla aropakariana, kopacoco vovolonga noa tahlana 'aoliana ihlaisa ma siihona. macahliako omaroa ngososangalʉiako iatʉhlʉnga, marapihli cocovovolonga patasoorohlitamahlʉnga mʉmʉana ia, ihlaisa kani'i kokana macoisa'aini toahlʉa aropakiahlahlamona maramaco ia kana'a kapalangʉlangʉa.
S.TRANSL: 今天只是一個開始，會不會和解 的責任，不在原住民族及平埔族 群身上，而在政府身上。我知 道，光是口頭的道歉是不夠的， 政府從現在開始，為原住民族所 做的一切，將是這個國家是否真 正能夠和解的關鍵。

Today is only a beginning. The duty for reconciliation lies not with the indigenous peoples and the Pingpu ethnic group, but with the government. I know that words of apology alone are not enough. What we actually do for the indigenous peoples will decide whether reconciliation succeeds or stumbles.

S.FORM: maruaku naani kisuhlivihlivimaluliri, maru parana-kapitanʉ kokana, tumamahlʉngʉ pimacuhlicaliva cucuvuvulunga, takʉsʉlʉmarapisapimacu taruacucuvungana, umarua miakungahla koka maramasumara mariapucu cu cu'u, nua aucaucani apuamiatahlanana takʉlʉsʉ ukikirimi hlicalivamacu hla arupakari koka aunanakaukakakua taku'i'iarʉ.

maroako naani kisohlivihlivimaloliri, maro parana-kapitanʉ kokana, tomamahlʉngʉ pimacohlicaliva cocovovolonga, takʉsʉlʉmarapisapimaco taroacocovongana, omaroa miakongahla koka maramasomara mariapoco co co'o, noa aocaocani apoamiatahlanana takʉlʉsʉ okikirimi hlicalivamaco hla aropakari koka aonanakaokakakoa tako'i'iarʉ.
S.TRANSL: 我要在此正式宣布，總統府將 設置「原住民族歷史正義與轉 型正義委員會」。我會以國家 元首的身分，親自擔任召集 人，與各族代表共同追求歷史 正義，也會對等地協商這個國 家往後的政策方向。

Therefore, I am here to announce that we are setting up an Indigenous Historical Justice and Transitional Justice Commission under the Presidential Office. As the head of state, I will serve as convener and work hand in hand with tribal representatives to pursue historical justice. We will also discuss, on the basis of equality, the future policy direction of this country.

S.FORM: tumuaku piapuhla paranatarucucuvungu kapitanʉkoka, mataingalʉpua langʉlangʉa, ihlaisakoka hla cucuvuvulunga aparaiahlʉa takuamia, apurumita aucaucanitahla apuamiana, alʉhlʉvʉtahlana'aulia rianʉcucutahlana hla miararuma kikucupuamiaparikiatungusana, kani'I sitakuamiana ihlaisa cucuvuvulungana pautatʉtʉrʉtakuamiana, tuahlʉatʉkʉ cucutahlana pakipuhlu.

tomoako piapohla paranatarococovongo kapitanʉkoka, mataingalʉpoa langʉlangʉa, ihlaisakoka hla cocovovolonga aparaiahlʉa takoamia, aporomita aocaocanitahla apoamiana, alʉhlʉvʉtahlana'aolia rianʉcocotahlana hla miararoma kikocopoamiaparikiatongosana, kani'I sitakoamiana ihlaisa cocovovolongana paotatʉtʉrʉtakoamiana, toahlʉatʉkʉ cocotahlana pakipohlo.
S.TRANSL: 我要強調，總統府的委員會， 最高度重視的，是國家和原住 民族的對等關係。各族代表的 產生，包括平埔族群，都會以 民族和部落的共識為基礎。這 個機制，將會是一個原住民族 集體決策的機制，可以把族人 的心聲真正傳達出來。

I want to stress that this commission places the greatest importance on equality between the country and the indigenous peoples. The election of tribal representatives, including for the Pingpu ethnic group, will take as basis the consensus of peoples and tribes. This commission will serve as a mechanism for collective decision-making by indigenous peoples, and will ensure that the voices of tribe members find true expression.

S.FORM: usumanʉ, macahliaku mʉmʉa kihlahlamu singcʉngein ,pauturumaripucu makarikari miapualʉsipakatʉra parikiatungusana cucuvuvulungana, macucutarʉana hlikikucua pauturuna cucuari siihuna, tuahlʉmaru mikasʉkasʉ paranana arupakaritakuamia ta'iarana, kani'i ta'iarana alʉhlʉvʉ ukikirimi hlicaliva hliatʉhlʉnga, miapapualʉ sipaiatuhluhlu takacicihli cucuvuvulungana, siparaiaiahla angahlahlana arataisana, masiaturu nua vungu kasitahlusuhlusu siaravahlaʉvaʉ, nua manganʉ sipaiatuhluhlu maikatumahlana cucutahlana.

osomanʉ, macahliako mʉmʉa kihlahlamo singcʉngein ,paotoromaripoco makarikari miapoalʉsipakatʉra parikiatongosana cocovovolongana, macocotarʉana hlikikocoa paotorona cocoari siihona, toahlʉmaro mikasʉkasʉ paranana aropakaritakoamia ta'iarana, kani'i ta'iarana alʉhlʉvʉ okikirimi hlicaliva hliatʉhlʉnga, miapapoalʉ sipaiatohlohlo takacicihli cocovovolongana, siparaiaiahla angahlahlana arataisana, masiatoro noa vongo kasitahlosohloso siaravahlaʉvaʉ, noa manganʉ sipaiatohlohlo maikatomahlana cocotahlana.
S.TRANSL: 另外，我也會要求行政院定 期召開「原住民族基本法推 動會」。委員會中所形成的 政策共識，未來的政府，會 在院的層級，來協調及處理 相關事務。這些事務包括歷 史記憶的追尋、原住民族自 治的推動、經濟的公平發展、 教育與文化的傳承、健康的 保障，以及都市族人權益的 維護等等。

In addition, I will request that our Executive Yuan convene regularly the Indigenous Peoples Basic Law Promotion Committee, and use the Yuan's authority to coordinate and handle matters related to any consensus reached by the above-mentioned commission. These matters include the following: to retrieve historical memories, to promote indigenous self-government, to seek fair economic development, to ensure continuation of culture and education, to safeguard indigenous health, and to protect the rights of urban indigenous peoples, etc.

S.FORM: umahlikua kani'i sipakatʉra hla mairahlu vunguka cucuvuvulungana, ma rumaiinitakuparaiahla, tumuaita mariacʉka pipuamahlʉngʉ vungukana taparana taku'i'iarʉ sipakatʉra cucuvuvulungana, apumiatakuamia tuma mahlʉngʉ, pamuamurʉ mairahluahlahlamani cucuvuvulunga,hla hlitamahlʉnga aruamimiacisa kani'i sipakatʉra kokana, hla tarʉtatʉkʉhlʉa tʉkʉisa minisuacuarupaliavalicu marisangihli.

omahlikoa kani'i sipakatʉra hla mairahlo vongoka cocovovolongana, ma romaiinitakoparaiahla, tomoaita mariacʉka pipoamahlʉngʉ vongokana taparana tako'i'iarʉ sipakatʉra cocovovolongana, apomiatakoamia toma mahlʉngʉ, pamoamorʉ mairahloahlahlamani cocovovolonga,hla hlitamahlʉnga aroamimiacisa kani'i sipakatʉra kokana, hla tarʉtatʉkʉhlʉa tʉkʉisa minisoacoaropaliavalico marisangihli.
S.TRANSL: 對於現代法律與原住民族傳 統文化，有些格格不入的地 方，我們要建立具有文化敏 感度的「原住民族法律服務中 心」，透過制度化的設計，來 緩和原住民族傳統慣習和現 行國家法律規範之間，日益頻 繁的衝突。

Where modern laws and indigenous traditional cultures are at odds, we will set up an Indigenous Legal Service Center with a high degree of cultural sensitivity, to reduce through institutional design the growing clashes between indigenous customs and modern laws.

S.FORM: macahliaku mʉmʉa makaritarʉana, umahlikua ma lanii hla aiihlana lʉhlʉ 'ʉna arupapiatʉtʉrʉ hlicaliva pakipuhlu kihlamuhlamu macuisaisa. kani'i aihlanalʉhlʉ'ʉ kunapasiavacangʉ mualualuia, uavura cucutahlana iamena mavacangʉ sipirasavungu.

macahliako mʉmʉa makaritarʉana, omahlikoa ma lanii hla aiihlana lʉhlʉ 'ʉna aropapiatʉtʉrʉ hlicaliva pakipohlo kihlamohlamo macoisaisa. kani'i aihlanalʉhlʉ'ʉ konapasiavacangʉ moaloaloia, oavora cocotahlana iamena mavacangʉ sipirasavongo.
S.TRANSL: 我會要求相關部門，立刻著 手整理，原住民族因為傳統 習俗，在傳統領域內，基於 非交易的需要，狩獵非保育類 動物，而遭受起訴與判刑的案 例。針對這些案例，我們來研 議解決的方案。

I will ask the relevant agencies to immediately pull together cases in which indigenous community members have been indicted or sentenced for hunting, where the hunting was done in accordance with traditional customs, on traditional lands, and for non-transactional needs, and where the animals hunted were not protected by conservation laws. For such cases we will deliberate solutions.

S.FORM: macahliaku mʉmʉa makaritarʉana, umahlikua ma lanii hla aiihlana lʉhlʉ 'ʉna arupapiatʉtʉrʉ hlicaliva pakipuhlu kihlamuhlamu macuisaisa. kani'i aihlanalʉhlʉ'ʉ kunapasiavacangʉ mualualuia, uavura cucutahlana iamena mavacangʉ sipirasavungu.

macahliako mʉmʉa makaritarʉana, omahlikoa ma lanii hla aiihlana lʉhlʉ 'ʉna aropapiatʉtʉrʉ hlicaliva pakipohlo kihlamohlamo macoisaisa. kani'i aihlanalʉhlʉ'ʉ konapasiavacangʉ moaloaloia, oavora cocotahlana iamena mavacangʉ sipirasavongo.
S.TRANSL: 我也會要求相關部門，針對核 廢料儲存在蘭嶼的相關決策經 過，提出真相調查報告。在核 廢料尚未最終處置之前，給予 雅美族人適當的補償。

I will also direct relevant agencies to present an investigative report on the decision-making process of nuclear waste storage on Orchid Island. Before finding a permanent solution for the nuclear waste, we will provide the Yami tribe appropriate compensation.

S.FORM: ihlaisa pasamia mʉlʉvʉpakituru apautatʉtʉrʉ tahlana 'aulia, paumahlʉngʉ mairahlu ngahlaisa ia takacicihli, maaruamu usia vulahlʉ matuluhlu aari mualualuia, makarikari auninia sitahlamiamia mavacangʉ, apalailingahlaisa'aulia uvuraisana manganʉ ta'iara hlaparana.

ihlaisa pasamia mʉlʉvʉpakitoro apaotatʉtʉrʉ tahlana 'aolia, paomahlʉngʉ mairahlo ngahlaisa ia takacicihli, maaroamo osia volahlʉ matolohlo aari moaloaloia, makarikari aoninia sitahlamiamia mavacangʉ, apalailingahlaisa'aolia ovoraisana manganʉ ta'iara hlaparana.
S.TRANSL: 同時，在尊重平埔族群的自我 認同、承認身分的原則下，我 們將會在九月三十日之前，檢 討相關法規，讓平埔族身分得 到應有的權利和地位。

At the same time, under the principle of respecting the Pingpu ethnic group's self- identity, and recognizing their identity, we will examine relevant laws before September 30 of this year, so that Pingpu ethnic group identity will receive the rights and status it deserves.

S.FORM: caihli-mamisa laihla-ucani vulahlʉ ucani aari, makarikariamu rumiatuma mahlʉngʉ ta'iara, patakuacahlia mairahlutukamiasasaruana cucuvuvulunga, takuamiahulicʉ miararuma mairahlucua mumiapapupualʉ ta'iarana, cucuaari atʉatʉhlʉnga cucuvuvulunga takacicihli maiatuhluhluna, makiira ngahlakirangahlanana maramacumacucu, pasakulaia sapahluhlamu takualualu, mataingalʉ pualisʉhla cucuvuvulungana, hulicʉ-sipaiatuhluhlu cucuvuvulunga, hulicʉ- sipaiatuhluhlusasaruana cucuvuvulunga, hulicʉ-siara hlusuhlusu arataisa ta'iara cucuvuvulunga, puatusu lipu'ing makarikari.

caihli-mamisa laihla-ocani volahlʉ ocani aari, makarikariamo romiatoma mahlʉngʉ ta'iara, patakoacahlia mairahlotokamiasasaroana cocovovolonga, takoamiaholicʉ miararoma mairahlocoa momiapapopoalʉ ta'iarana, cocoaari atʉatʉhlʉnga cocovovolonga takacicihli maiatohlohlona, makiira ngahlakirangahlanana maramacomacoco, pasakolaia sapahlohlamo takoaloalo, mataingalʉ poalisʉhla cocovovolongana, holicʉ-sipaiatohlohlo cocovovolonga, holicʉ- sipaiatohlohlosasaroana cocovovolonga, holicʉ-siara hlosohloso arataisa ta'iara cocovovolonga, poatoso lipo'ing makarikari.
S.TRANSL: 今年的十一月一日，我們會開 始劃設、公告原住民族傳統領 域土地。部落公法人的制度， 我們已經推動上路，未來，原 住民族自治的理想，將會一步 一步落實。我們會加快腳步， 將原住民族最重視的「原住民 族自治法」、「原住民族土地及 海域法」、「原住民族語言發展 法」等法案，送請立法院審議。

On November 1 of this year, we will begin to delineate and announce indigenous traditional territories and lands. The system of tribal public corporation is already in place. In the future, the ideals of indigenous self-government will be realized step by step. We will step up the pace and submit for legislative deliberation three laws of great importance to indigenous peoples: the Indigenous Peoples Self-Government Law, the Indigenous Peoples Land and Sea Areas Law, and the Indigenous Languages Development Law.

S.FORM: arinani kʉlʉpʉngʉkumamahlipapu, maria cuvucuvungucuamu, mʉmʉa cucuvuvulungana makarikari, marusipakarikarina kisumahlʉngʉ. cucuari caihlicaihli ualuvulahlʉ ucaniaari singcʉngein, umahliakuamʉmʉa cucu'u kokana, kihlamuhlamu kisuhlivihlivi hlicaliva maacuuisa cucuvuvulunga, takʉsʉlʉa takuamia taku'i'iarʉ macuuisana. takumacu hlicaliva cucuvuvulunga macuisana, hla apusirisipaiatuhluhlu cucuvuvulunga parikiatungusa ihlaisa utulutaisa takukakua siihuna takuamia cucuvuvulunga.

arinani kʉlʉpʉngʉkomamahlipapo, maria covocovongocoamo, mʉmʉa cocovovolongana makarikari, marosipakarikarina kisomahlʉngʉ. cocoari caihlicaihli oalovolahlʉ ocaniaari singcʉngein, omahliakoamʉmʉa coco'o kokana, kihlamohlamo kisohlivihlivi hlicaliva maacooisa cocovovolonga, takʉsʉlʉa takoamia tako'i'iarʉ macooisana. takomaco hlicaliva cocovovolonga macoisana, hla aposirisipaiatohlohlo cocovovolonga parikiatongosa ihlaisa otolotaisa takokakoa siihona takoamia cocovovolonga.
S.TRANSL: 今天下午，我們就要召開全 國原住民族行政會議。在會 議中，政府會有更多政策的說 明。以後每一年的八月一日， 行政院都會向全國人民報告原 住民族歷史正義及轉型正義的 執行進度。落實原住民族基本 法，達成原住民族的歷史正 義，並建立原住民族的自治基 礎，就是政府原住民族政策上 的三大目標。

Later this afternoon, we will convene a national indigenous peoples administrative meeting. In that meeting, the government will elaborate on the policies. On every August 1 to come, the Executive Yuan will report to the indigenous peoples our progress on restoring historical justice and transitional justice. To implement the Indigenous Peoples Basic Law, to serve indigenous historical justice, and to lay the foundation for indigenous self- government – these are the three major goals for the government's policy towards indigenous peoples.

S.FORM: makuakuaku ma kani'i paranana, maru'ahlingu salasapuarʉ apuasasalakarina hlamʉmʉa cucuvuvulunga tukucuta , pasaʉlʉsʉ pakita cucu'u hlita'iara, makuakuaku apʉcʉkʉhlʉ mʉmʉa miasarakumita, kuihlaisa umaiapʉsuhlatʉ, makukua cucutahlana tukucu pasamanganʉ, tumuru ta'iarana apakipuhluhlipitʉtʉra siihuna, macuuisa pangahlangahla hlipasapua hlicalivana.

makoakoako ma kani'i paranana, maro'ahlingo salasapoarʉ apoasasalakarina hlamʉmʉa cocovovolonga tokocota , pasaʉlʉsʉ pakita coco'o hlita'iara, makoakoako apʉcʉkʉhlʉ mʉmʉa miasarakomita, koihlaisa omaiapʉsohlatʉ, makokoa cocotahlana tokoco pasamanganʉ, tomoro ta'iarana apakipohlohlipitʉtʉra siihona, macooisa pangahlangahla hlipasapoa hlicalivana.
S.TRANSL: 我要邀請在場的、在電視及 網路轉播前的全體原住民族 朋友們，一起來當見證人。 我邀請大家來監督，而不是 來背書。請族人朋友們用力 鞭策、指教，讓政府實現承 諾，真正改進過往的錯誤。

To all of our indigenous friends here and watching on TV and online: I invite you to stand witness. I invite you not to endorse, but to oversee. Please keep pressure on the government and right its course where necessary, so that it will realize its commitments and right historical wrongs.

S.FORM: sia'ʉ'ʉraisa patasuuru cucuvuvulunga tukucu, ihlaisa ihlamua hlipatakumahlʉngʉ kani'I patasurucucu'u hla kokana, hlirumakua sasaruana nua mairahlu ahlamakiariari, uka'a taisana hlimuliuhlu kani'iliuhluna mairahlu avuriiakana'ana sipualangʉlangʉ.

sia'ʉ'ʉraisa patasooro cocovovolonga tokoco, ihlaisa ihlamoa hlipatakomahlʉngʉ kani'I patasorococo'o hla kokana, hliromakoa sasaroana noa mairahlo ahlamakiariari, oka'a taisana hlimoliohlo kani'iliohlona mairahlo avoriiakana'ana sipoalangʉlangʉ.
S.TRANSL: 我感謝所有的原住民族朋友， 是你們提醒了這個國家的所有 人，腳踏的土地，以及古老的 傳統，有著無可取代的價值。 這些價值，應該給予它尊嚴。

I want to thank all of our indigenous friends. You remind everyone in this country that there is irreplaceable value in the land we tread on and the traditions we inherit. This value deserves dignity.

S.FORM: cucuari apuamihlamu ta'iarana miapualʉ, apulavaʉ muvavilihli cucutahlana hlamuhlamua muvavilihli, hla kani'i sasaruana patasuurutahlana taivangʉna, kucuparahlupuakari kucuparahlupua hliatʉhlʉnga, mataingalicukucu uruavi'avi'a vunguka takacicihli, kucuuangahlangahla marusasaruana takacicihlina takuiaili.

cocoari apoamihlamo ta'iarana miapoalʉ, apolavaʉ movavilihli cocotahlana hlamohlamoa movavilihli, hla kani'i sasaroana patasoorotahlana taivangʉna, kocoparahlopoakari kocoparahlopoa hliatʉhlʉnga, mataingalicokoco oroavi'avi'a vongoka takacicihli, kocooangahlangahla marosasaroana takacicihlina takoiaili.
S.TRANSL: 未來，我們會透過政策的推 動，讓下一代的族人、讓世世 代代的族人，以及台灣這塊土 地上所有族群，都不會再失 語，不會再失去記憶，更不會 再與自己的文化傳統疏離，不 會繼續在自己的土地上流浪。

In the future, we will push for policies to ensure that succeeding generations of indigenous tribes and all ethnic peoples in Taiwan never lose their languages and memories, that they are never separated from their cultural traditions, and that never again are they lost in a land of their own.

S.FORM: malitʉnʉlʉ ikatumahlana pasalʉsʉ pasamanganʉ, pautuhlangi hlicaliva hlamu pautuhlangi sasaruanahlamu, pautuhlangimʉmʉa tarʉtatʉkʉhlʉ vungukahlamu, mukakakua arupakiahlahlamu, mukakakua kiakucua mangusipi kiakucu masasangarʉ, mukakakua varu'u taivangʉcucuaari.

malitʉnʉlʉ ikatomahlana pasalʉsʉ pasamanganʉ, paotohlangi hlicaliva hlamo paotohlangi sasaroanahlamo, paotohlangimʉmʉa tarʉtatʉkʉhlʉ vongokahlamo, mokakakoa aropakiahlahlamo, mokakakoa kiakocoa mangosipi kiakoco masasangarʉ, mokakakoa varo'o taivangʉcocoaari.
S.TRANSL: 我請求整個社會一起努 力，認識我們的歷史，認 識我們的土地，也認識我 們不同族群的文化。走向 和解，走向共存和共榮， 走向台灣新的未來。

I call upon our entire society to come together and get to know our history, get to know our land, and get to know the cultures of our many ethnic peoples. Let us work towards reconciliation, a shared existence and shared prosperity, and a new future for Taiwan.

S.FORM: umuhlipasamia arinanina, pasaʉlʉsʉ pasamanganʉ maringahlangahla ucani macuuisakoka, ucani macuuisa ma tumuhluka tarʉtatʉatʉkʉhlʉ tahlana sitakuamia kokana.
omohlipasamia arinanina, pasaʉlʉsʉ pasamanganʉ maringahlangahla ocani macooisakoka, ocani macooisa ma tomohloka tarʉtatʉatʉkʉhlʉ tahlana sitakoamia kokana.
S.TRANSL: 我請求所有國人，藉著今 天的機會，一起努力來打 造一個正義的國家，一個 真正多元而平等的國家。
I call upon all citizens to seize the opportunities offered by this day – to join together, work hard, and build a country of justice, a country of true diversity and equality.

'ʉ'ʉraisa mʉmʉa.
